function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misunderstanding about COVID-19 transmission and prevention","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of the virus due to misinformation","Mitigation":"Education and public awareness campaigns to provide accurate information","Technologies":"Social media and digital platforms for information dissemination","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Underrepresentation of certain regions in the study","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of knowledge and attitudes due to regional biases","Mitigation":"Ensuring equal representation of all regions in future studies","Technologies":"Demographic targeting in survey recruitment","People":"Researchers, survey organizers","Owner":"Academic and research institutions"},{"Description":"Gender disparity in COVID-19 knowledge","Impact":"Unequal distribution of accurate information and prevention strategies","Mitigation":"Targeted educational programs to address knowledge gaps","Technologies":"Online educational resources and webinars","People":"Men and women","Owner":"Educational institutions and public health authorities"}]}
